Russia thwarts drone attack on oil refinery in Yaroslavl - governorRussian air defences thwarted a drone attack on Monday on the Slavneft-YANOS oil refinery in the city of Yaroslavl, northeast of Moscow, regional governor Mikhail Yevrayev said. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 09:12:38 GMT EBKZRLEZ5NO7NLALZLMW2YCQ5E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-thwarts-drone-attack-oil-refinery-yaroslavl-governor-2024-01-29/Reuters世界欧洲
Fifty-two killed in fighting in disputed region straddling Sudan and South SudanMore than 50 people, including women and children, were killed in attacks along South Sudan's border with Sudan, a local official said. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 09:05:40 GMT Q33CPCDYQVKPTCIE57XMUOYOPU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/fifty-two-killed-fighting-disputed-region-straddling-sudan-south-sudan-2024-01-29/Waakhe Simon Wudu世界非洲
Philippines denies 'special arrangements' with China to supply troops on reefThe Philippines on Monday denied China had a "temporary special arrangement" with Manila to allow the delivery of supplies to Philippine troops occupying a disputed South China Sea reef, calling it "a figment of imagination". Mon, 29 Jan 2024 08:58:06 GMT VLKI3JYFKZIMRG6G2XG7JJKUSA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-denies-special-arrangements-with-china-supply-troops-reef-2024-01-29/Reuters世界亚太地区
Hungary open to using EU budget for Ukraine aid package, Orban's adviser saysHungary is open to using the European Union budget for a proposed 50 billion euro ($54 billion) aid package to Ukraine, Prime Minister Viktor Orban's political director said on social media platform X. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 08:32:46 GMT X2YBF2ZNDBL67M7E4H3X3EJYLY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hungary-open-using-eu-budget-ukraine-aid-package-orbans-adviser-says-2024-01-29/Reuters世界欧洲
China urges faster progress in billion-dollar railway link to ThailandChina and Thailand must accelerate the construction of a planned high-speed railway linking the countries, Chinese foreign minister Wang Yi said on Monday, pushing an ambitious Southeast Asian network. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 08:09:20 GMT 5MUTOIOBB5K5ZPRX4XTOEOKIZY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-urges-faster-progress-billion-dollar-railway-link-thailand-2024-01-29/Reuters世界亚太地区
China foreign ministry will 'seriously' study resuming visa-free policy for JapanChina's foreign ministry said on Monday that it would "seriously" study resuming a previous visa-free arrangement for Japanese visitors to China. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 08:01:52 GMT SCCAII67BZPR5KV7Q4MS7ERGDE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-foreign-ministry-will-seriously-study-resuming-visa-free-policy-japan-2024-01-29/Reuters世界亚太地区
Austria suspends payments to UN Palestinian agency - foreign ministryAustria is suspending payments to the United Nations' Palestinian aid agency, UNRWA, pending a full investigation into accusations that its employees were involved in the Oct. 7 Hamas attack on Israel, the Austrian foreign ministry said on Monday. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 07:57:28 GMT RK6XTHOJJBIWTIMVB3RMNFJL5E https://www.reuters.com/world/austria-suspends- payments-un-palestinian-agency-foreign-ministry-2024-01-29/Reuters世界
Brussels threatens to hit Hungary's economy if Orban vetoes Ukraine aid - FTThe European Union will sabotage Hungary's economy if Budapest blocks fresh aid to Ukraine at a summit this week, under a confidential plan drawn up by Brussels, the Financial Times reported on Sunday. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 07:46:04 GMT HOSUXGSXLZKM7KD3IE2QXAGDRQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/brussels-threatens-hit-hungarys-economy-if-orban-vetoes-ukraine-aid-ft-2024-01-29/Reuters世界欧洲
'I think it's the fentanyl': Philippines' Marcos hits back at predecessor DutertePhilippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. struck back on Monday at his firebrand predecessor Rodrigo Duterte who called him a "drug addict", saying the former leader's fentanyl use could have affected his judgment. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 07:41:44 GMT THDXKR4IVZPU3AZNDJL7C73FXY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/i-think-its-fentanyl-philippines-marcos-hits-back-predecessor-duterte-2024-01-29/Reuters世界亚太地区
China, HK sign arrangement on reciprocal recognition of civil, commercial casesChina's Supreme Court and Hong Kong's Department of Justice said on Monday that they signed an arrangement on the reciprocal recognition and enforcement of judgements in civil and commercial cases effective immediately in both places. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 07:21:44 GMT LDM347DUZVLKRBA34TBD4X5P6E https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-hk-sign-arrangement-reciprocal-recognition-civil-commercial-cases-2024-01-29/Reuters世界中国
France to push for EU law changes as farmers block Paris highwaysFrance said it would push to ease European Union environmental regulations on fallow farmland this week, as tractors blocked major highways out of Paris on Monday and nationwide farmers' protests intensified. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 07:08:57 GMT 2SRCQVUQAVPNXCJAQCHWFV5FUY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/france-wants-eu-law-changes-this-week-help-protesting-farmers-minister-2024-01-29/Reuters世界欧洲
